text: Mauro Raphael, also known as Maurinho (6 June 1933 – 28 June 1995) was a Brazilian football player. He played for the Brazil national team in the 1954 FIFA World Cup. == Honours == ; São Paulo *Campeonato Paulista: 1953, 1957 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Footballers from São Paulo (state)
title: Maurinho (footballer, born 1933)
